section_title: REPORT OF THE BONN CLIMATE CHANGE CONFERENCE
sentences: The UN Climate Change Conference in Bonn opened on Monday morning, 6 June 2011.

This report summarizes the discussions of the four bodies, based on their respective agendas: - 34th session of the Subsidiary Body for Scientific and Technological Advice (SBSTA); - 34th session of the Subsidiary Body for Implementation (SBI); - resumed 16th session of the Ad Hoc Working Group on Further Commitments for Annex I Parties under the Kyoto Protocol (AWG-KP); and - resumed 14th session of the Ad Hoc Working Group on Long-term Cooperative Action under the Convention (AWG-LCA).
